format: html

::: {.cell hash='aula14_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_62910de9e3c70d2f78a16bd9e44694e2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.2     ✔ readr     2.1.4
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0
✔ ggplot2   3.4.2     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.2     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0
✔ purrr     1.0.1     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
estande <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "estande")

estande |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants, group = exp))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~exp)+
  ylim(0,max(estande$nplants))+
  geom_smooth(se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula14_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula14_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_9634a3de437ca88cce56c0ebda77143c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
estande2 <- estande |>
  filter(exp == 2)|>
  group_by(trat) |> 
  summarise(mean_nplants = mean(nplants))

estande2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, mean_nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  #geom_line()+
  geom_smooth(se = F, formula = y ~ poly(x, 2), method = "lm", color = "black")+
  theme_minimal()+
  annotate(geom = "text",
           x = 25, y = 70,
           label = "y = 66.3 - 1.777x + 0.0222x2 
R2 = 0.88")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula14_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula14_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_5b4e0bacb9deaa49d84f37a1a3cfd869'}

```{.r .cell-code}
estande2 <- estande2 |> 
  mutate(trat2 = trat^2)

m1 <- lm(mean_nplants ~ trat, 
         data = estande2)
summary(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = mean_nplants ~ trat, data = estande2)

Residuals:
     1      2      3      4      5      6 
12.764 -2.134 -6.782 -3.327 -4.669  4.147 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  60.9857     4.5505  13.402 0.000179 ***
trat         -0.7007     0.2012  -3.483 0.025294 *  
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 8.117 on 4 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.752,	Adjusted R-squared:   0.69 
F-statistic: 12.13 on 1 and 4 DF,  p-value: 0.02529
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(m1$residuals)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula14_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
m2 <- lm(mean_nplants ~ trat + trat2, 
         data = estande2)
summary(m2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = mean_nplants ~ trat + trat2, data = estande2)

Residuals:
      1       2       3       4       5       6 
 7.4484 -4.4200 -6.4386  1.0739  3.0474 -0.7111 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 66.30156    4.70800  14.083 0.000776 ***
trat        -1.77720    0.62263  -2.854 0.064878 .  
trat2        0.02223    0.01242   1.790 0.171344    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 6.517 on 3 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.8801,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.8001 
F-statistic: 11.01 on 2 and 3 DF,  p-value: 0.04152
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(m1, m2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   df      AIC
m1  3 45.72200
m2  4 43.36151
```
:::
:::


Duas Variáveis


::: {.cell hash='aula14_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_7458129ea660d548da66a118cd2bcd73'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mofo <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx",
                   "mofo")
mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(inc, yld))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se = F, method = "lm")+
  facet_wrap(~ study)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula14_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula14_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_89bd51a449eadd5e2fa261dd756ef672'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mofo1 <- mofo |> 
  filter(study == 3)
mofo1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 13 × 5
   study treat   inc   scl   yld
   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
 1     3     1    65  5013  2839
 2     3     2    33  3619  3375
 3     3     3    40  2325  3264
 4     3     4    35  2588  3301
 5     3     5    48  3969  3220
 6     3     6    31  1556  3321
 7     3     7    39  3175  3229
 8     3     8    25  1763  3517
 9     3     9    26  2894  3595
10     3    10    21   350  3702
11     3    11    23   419  3652
12     3    12    25   644  3608
13     3    13    33  2850  3334
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
shapiro.test(mofo1$yld)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Shapiro-Wilk normality test

data:  mofo1$yld
W = 0.92193, p-value = 0.2663
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cor.test(mofo1$inc, mofo1$yld)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Pearson's product-moment correlation

data:  mofo1$inc and mofo1$yld
t = -10.9, df = 11, p-value = 3.105e-07
alternative hypothesis: true correlation is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 -0.9872663 -0.8579544
sample estimates:
      cor 
-0.956692 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
pcor <- cor(mofo1 |>  select(3:5), method = "spearman")
library(corrplot)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
corrplot 0.92 loaded
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
corrplot(pcor, method = 'number', type = "lower")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula14_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
